briefTitle: Effect of Mindful Eating on Weight Management in Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: Effect of a Mindful Eating Intervention on Weight Management in Overweight and Obese Postmenopausal Breast Cancer Survivors
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Postmenopausal female
* Breast cancer survivor (in remission)
* Completed cancer treatment at the time of study enrollment
* Body Mass Index (BMI) equal or greater than 25 kg/m²

Exclusion Criteria:

* None.
